title: Bengaluru eateries to offer paper napkins only on demand
description: The Bruhat Bengaluru Hotels Association (BBHA) in Bengaluru, India, has called on its approximately 40,000 member-establishments to minimize the use of paper napkins and offer them to customers only upon request. Currently, BBHA's members consume 10 tonnes of paper napkins daily.
